com.capgemini.cobigen.api

Interface HealthCheck


  • public interface HealthCheck
    The HealthCheck upgrades the context configuration and the templates configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HealthCheckReport perform(Path configurationPath)
      Performs a health check of the CobiGen plug-in.
      HealthCheckReport upgradeAllConfigurations(Path configurationPath, BackupPolicy backupPolicy)
      Upgrades both the context configuration and the templates configuration.
      HealthCheckReport upgradeContextConfiguration(Path contextConfiguration, BackupPolicy backupPolicy)
      Upgrades the context configuration file.
      HealthCheckReport upgradeTemplatesConfiguration(Path templatesConfigurationFolder, BackupPolicy backupPolicy)
      Upgrades a specific template configuration file.

    • Method Detail

      • upgradeContextConfiguration

        HealthCheckReport upgradeContextConfiguration(Path contextConfiguration,
                                              BackupPolicy backupPolicy)
        Upgrades the context configuration file.
        Parameters:
        contextConfiguration - the path to the context configuration file
        backupPolicy - the BackupPolicy that should be used for the function
        Returns:
        the HealthCheckReport of this HealthCheck

      • upgradeTemplatesConfiguration

        HealthCheckReport upgradeTemplatesConfiguration(Path templatesConfigurationFolder,
                                                BackupPolicy backupPolicy)
        Upgrades a specific template configuration file.
        Parameters:
        templatesConfigurationFolder - the path to the templates configuration
        backupPolicy - the BackupPolicy that should be used for the function
        Returns:
        the HealthCheckReport of this HealthCheck

      • upgradeAllConfigurations

        HealthCheckReport upgradeAllConfigurations(Path configurationPath,
                                           BackupPolicy backupPolicy)
        Upgrades both the context configuration and the templates configuration. For future usage in other plug-ins.
        Parameters:
        configurationPath - the path in which the files are that should be upgraded. Further changes of the path might be necessary for further adaption to different plug-ins.
        backupPolicy - the BackupPolicy that should be used for the function
        Returns:
        the HealthCheckReport created by the HealthCheck

      • perform

        HealthCheckReport perform(Path configurationPath)
        Performs a health check of the CobiGen plug-in.
        Parameters:
        configurationPath - the path in which the files are that should be checked regarding their version and validity. Further changes of the path might be necessary for further adaption to different plug-ins.
        Returns:
        the HealthCheckReport created by the HealthCheck
